scripts.build: cp ../../../README.md . && rm -f jsii-*.whl && yarn generate && yarn deps && yarn lint
scripts.test: yarn test:gen && yarn test:run:typeguard-2 && yarn test:run:typeguard-3 && yarn test:run:typeguard-4 && yarn test:types
scripts.test:run:typeguard-2: ts-node build-tools/venv.ts python -m pip install typeguard==2.13.3 && ts-node build-tools/venv.ts py.test -v --mypy
scripts.test:run:typeguard-3: ts-node build-tools/venv.ts python -m pip install typeguard==3.0.2 && ts-node build-tools/venv.ts py.test -v --mypy
scripts.test:run:typeguard-4: ts-node build-tools/venv.ts python -m pip install typeguard==4.3.0 && ts-node build-tools/venv.ts py.test -v --mypy
